author: Special Correspondent
text:
Former Defence Minister and Congress leader A.K. Antony said here on Thursday that Prime Minister Narendra Modi and the government had the duty to tell the nation what went wrong in Pathankot and who was at fault.

“What happened at Pathankot [airbase] is a serious breach of the nation’s security. How could the most important forward base of the Air Force come under such a brazen terrorist attack? The Centre has a duty to explain the circumstances that led to such an attack. The Prime Minister must tell the people how this happened,” Mr. Antony said.
title: ‘PM must explain what went wrong’
